import './Form.css' import React from 'react' import vector from './vector.png' import { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios' const LoginForm = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(); const [password, setPassword] = useState(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post('mongodb://localhost:27017/loginform', {email, password}) .then(result => console.log(result)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) } return (

setEmail(e.target.value)} />
